LanguageData.USH_NA_: {PAWN} doesn't carry any disease that can be sampled.
LanguageData.USH_NA_InfectionChanceDesc: The chance for necroa to spread after a successful shambler attack: {0}.
LanguageData.USH_NA_SeverityPerAttackDesc: The severity of necroa infection will be increased by {0} per successful shambler attack.
LanguageData.USH_NA_BleedingOnlyDesc: With this enabled the necroa will spread only if the attack by shambler caused bleeding on the target.
